ive noticed a few people on here have posted comments asking how to get this game to work because it wont work etc.. or it says wrong disk.. though it seems like it wont work.. because of the wrong disk thing.. dont be fooled i got it to work.. and heres how.. 
requiered program.. nero to burn the iso image
or some other image burning program 
step 1: download this torrent

step 2: open nero

step 3: burn the image to a disk

step 4: install from disk

step 5: go to http://www.gameburnworld.com/gp/gamefixes/rollercoastertycoon2.shtml  like "kmo197" said 
and download the no cd patch click through the download links theres about 3 or so windows that will open up..
step 6: go into my computer/local disk c:/program files/Infogrames Interactive/roller coaster tycoon 2 

step 7:now back up your exe file in there save it somewere safe.. now find the file location in which you saved your no patch cd from

step 8:right click on that no cd patch unzip it first if its zipped i dont remember if it was or not.. and then right click on the icon that looks the same as the one you just backed up and click copy

step 9: now go back to the main game directory again and right click paste the exe no cd patch in there click yes overwrite the file now take out the disk and your done go ahead and open up the game and play have fun if you get lost or didn't catch something on this then email me at "pirate1018239@live.com" let me know i will make a tutorial on youtube and send you the link if confused.. it should be pretty easy though
